talents.option1: Tricks of the Trade Applies a Basic Dispel

abilities.desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.
abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.notes: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.

abilities.desc: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.notes: You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.

abilities.desc: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.
abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.notes: Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.

abilities.desc: Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep.  The target will wake up at the end of the duration or if they take too much damage. Upon waking up, the target takes damage and is slowed.
abilities.name: Sleeping Dart

abilities.desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. Bonus damage is doubled against non-hero units. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.
abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.notes: Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.
